name: Dry Hazard
description:
A thousand years ago, you were putted into a golf course lake and forgotten. Five hundred years ago, all the humans disappeared. 100 years ago, the lake dried up. A moment ago, you suddenly felt the need to start moving.

This game was made by @OfflineTheReal and @CoalBones for the #11th Curdle jam!

This is the first ever Game Jam we entered!

For the best experience, playing the windows version is strongly recommended!
Thank you for playing!
